agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Administration TIME & DATE: 1:00 PM or upon adjournment Wednesday, May 1, 2019 PLACE: 2E.20 (Betty King Cmte. Rm.) CHAIR: Senator Bryan Hughes HB 39 Zerwas | et al. SP: Nelson Relating to the repeal of certain time limitations on the award of grants by the Cancer Prevention and Research Institute of Texas Oversight Committee. HB 405 Minjarez | et al. SP: Kolkhorst Relating to designating June as Neonatal Abstinence Syndrome Awareness Month. HB 435 Shaheen | et al. SP: Zaffirini Relating to the maintenance of information entered into a fee record. HB 811 White | et al. SP: West Relating to determining appropriate disciplinary action to be taken against a public school student who is in foster care or who is homeless. HB 1064 Ashby | et al. SP: Birdwell Relating to designating May 4 as Texas Firefighters Day. HB 1494 Guillen SP: Zaffirini Relating to surety bonds for deputy clerks and other employees of county and district clerks. HB 1508 Oliverson | et al. SP: Lucio Relating to designating March as Bleeding Disorders Awareness Month. HB 1612 Murphy SP: Huffman Relating to the authority of the Teacher Retirement System of Texas to invest in certain hedge funds. HB 1665 Patterson SP: Paxton Relating to certain workers' compensation reporting requirements. HB 1760 White | et al. SP: Perry Relating to the confidentiality, sharing, sealing, and destruction of juvenile records and certain records of at-risk youth. HB 2004 Leach | et al. SP: Fallon Relating to the dismissal of certain actions relating to Medicaid fraud. HB 2079 Coleman | et al. SP: Miles Relating to compensation under the Crime Victims' Compensation Act for certain expenses. HB 2235 Thompson, Senfronia | et al. SP: Perry Relating to the amount credited in a state fiscal year to the judicial fund to provide basic civil legal services. HB 2298 Parker | et al. SP: West Relating to designating January 28 as Sexual Assault Survivors Day. HB 2326 Meyer | et al. SP: Hancock Relating to the continuation of a health care provider participation program by the Dallas County Hospital District. HB 2597 Cyrier | et al. SP: Fallon Relating to designating May 17 as Diffuse Intrinsic Pontine Glioma Awareness Day. HB 2888 Springer SP: Perry Relating to a petition filed for a place on the ballot as a candidate for the board of directors of the Wilbarger County Hospital District. HB 3459 Coleman | et al. SP: Miles Relating to the creation and operations of a health care provider participation program by the Harris County Hospital District. HB 4650 Oliverson SP: Bettencourt Relating to the powers and duties of the Harris County Municipal Utility District No. 441; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose a tax. HB 4651 Oliverson SP: Bettencourt Relating to the creation of the Harris County Municipal Utility District No. 571; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes. HB 4654 Metcalf SP: Creighton Relating to the board of directors and powers and duties of the East Montgomery County Municipal Utility District No. 12; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes. HCR 19 Herrero | et al. SP: Huffman Urging Congress to repeal the Government Pension Offset and the Windfall Elimination Provision of the Social Security Act. HCR 40 Geren SP: Hughes Authorizing the lieutenant governor and speaker to appoint joint committees. HCR 42 Wu | et al. SP: Alvarado Designating February 26 as Bone Marrow, Blood, and Organ Donation Registry Day for a 10-year period beginning in 2019. HCR 59 Guillen SP: Powell Designating the second week of November as School Psychologist Appreciation Week for a 10-year period beginning in 2019. SCR 58 Perry Designating Levelland as the official City of Mosaics of Texas. The committee will certify bills for the Local and Uncontested Calendar to be held on May 3, 2019, at 8:00 a.m. Bills added after last posting: HB 39 HB 1494 HB 1760 HB 2004 HB 2079 HB 2298 HB 2597 HB 4650 HB 4651 HB 4654 HCR 40 HCR 59 Bills deleted after last posting: SB 1898 SCR 17 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions of the schedule **
